item.title: Blog: Build Docker images *quickly* with GitHub Actions and a self-hosted runner
item.description:
GitHub Actions is a fantastic workflow engine. Combine it with multi-stage Docker builds and you have a CI process defined in a few lines of YAML, which lives inside your Git repo. In this blog, Docker Captain Elton Stoneman how to build Docker images quickly with GitHub Actions and a self-hosted runner

item.title: Blog: How to use Docker Security Scan Locally
item.description:
Docker and Snyk recently entered into a partnership to provide container vulnerability scanning. What does this mean for you? Snyk is now integrated with Docker Hub to scan official images. Additionally, Docker has integrated the Snyk scanning directly into Docker Desktop clients. Under this blog post, Docker Captain Brian Christner walkthrough how Docker Scan works, How to initiate a Docker Scan on an Image and reference a Dockerfile and so on..
